name: Fairway: A Golf RPG
description:
A top down RPG where the player takes control of a golf ball to save the lands of Fairway from the evil wizard Bhir'Dee. Explore, solve puzzles, and fight your way through the lands of fairway on this epic dungeon-crawling adventure!

Developers

Corben Gilbert - Programming / Design
https://www.corbengilbert.com/

Alex MacDonald - Sound Design / Level Design
https://xalexmd9x.wixsite.com/alex-macdonald

Gabe St. Onge - 3D Art / Level Design
https://www.gabestonge.com/

Ben Kerr - Programming / Design
https://www.benpkerr.com/

Charlotte Cook - Art / Level Design
https://charlottecatherinec.wixsite.com/portfolio

Scott Parker - Music / Level Design
https://www.scottparkergames.com/

This game is being developed for our 2023 Capstone Project in the Honours Bachelor of Game Design Program at Sheridan College, Oakville, Ontario, Canada.
